extendedInfo.description: The Santa Cruz Police Department (SCPD) mobile application gives you access to the latest alerts, news, photos, videos and crime information wherever you are.Serving a beautiful and vibrant coastal community, the men and women of the Santa Cruz Police Department are dedicated to public safety, innovation and high-quality customer service. As an agency at the forefront of transparency and technological innovation, SCPD is proud to present one of the first mobile applications for law enforcement in the country. Join with us in our endeavor to provide a more responsive and open police department.Use SCPD mobile to view real-time crime maps, provide crime tips, view photos of wanted subjects, read the latest department news, watch SCPD-related videos, and more.Features include:â¢ Scanner: Wondering why the police were in your neighborhood? The live scanner feed will tell you.â¢ Tips: Provide crime tips right from your Iphone!â¢ Maps: View real-time crime maps of activity occurring in your community.â¢ News: Get the latest news written directly by the Chief, department officers and staff.â¢ Video: Watch videos from our SCPD YouTube channel.â¢ Photos: View new images of the SCPDâs most wanted and browse through albums of images from recent police events.â¢ Alerts: Receive trusted, instant alerts directly from the Santa Cruz Police Department.* Twitter: Follow SCPD Twitter feed in real-time.* Facebook: Access SCPD Facebook page right from the Dashboard.The information can also be accessed through any mobile browser at:http://m.santacruzpolice.comWe anticipate adding additional features in the future, so stay tuned.This application is powered by, and was developed in collaboration with http://gomobilepd.com

reviews.title: Sc pd app Sucks
reviews.comment: This app sucks nothing is current!!! Its not user friendly and the scanner does not work. (
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: scanner is broken.
reviews.comment: I actually thought the app was fixed. It would be awesome if they could work the bugs out of this app. The scanner never worked 100%, but now it doesn\'t even work at all. So much for forward progress.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Santa Cruz, WooT!
reviews.comment: don\'t rate poorly because your phone sucks.  this is a great app and is very helpful for those of us that live in SC.  thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User
